name: HaikuReader
0:
”Alexa, ask haiku reader to give me a simple haiku”
”Alexa, ask haiku reader to give me a Haiku poem”
”Alexa, ask haiku reader to give me a Haiku”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: haiku reader
des: Haiku Reader is a prompter. If user would like to listen wise quotes about life, beauty of the nature or something to fix their mood, he can ask for a haiku from Haiku Reader. User can make it as a ritual in their life! It includes haikus about life codes, nature, seasons, etc. User can get this service from any kind of Echo device such as Echo, echo Show , Echo dot. Firs user has to awake the device by saying a awake word and then user can prompt for a haiku and the Haiku Reader would provide random haiku from it's haiku list.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
